details.title: Radar target resolution probability in a noise-limited environment
details.abstract: This paper investigates the probability of a radar being able to resolve two point-targets in an environment in which additive noise is the primary limitation on resolution. The statistical properties of the radar cross-ambiguity function are developed and used to arrive at an expression for the target resolution probability. The analysis is verified through simulations.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
